name: Miracle Circus
description: Qi joins the miracle circus as a genius magician. The other members all welcome Qi’s coming, like Liao, Liu, Ji, Xiang,Ning. But as the night is near around, something is approaching, straightly to their heart. Who is watching? And who are the demons of night exactly? Qi starts his investigation on a common day like this...
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 7 Win 8 Win10 Processor: Intel Pentium III 800 MHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 1024x768 High Color + DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 300 MB available space
